thread.title: A Short Interview With Peter Lynch On The Dangers Of Bottom Fishing

author: VW Staff
title: A Short Interview With Peter Lynch On The Dangers Of Bottom Fishing
text:
Flip 
A interview with Peter Lynch on the Television program Wall Street Week. In the interview Peter discusses how the public have advantages over the institutions and how to they can capitalize on those advantages. He also warns of the dangers of Bottom Fishing. The interview is followed by a short segment with Philip Carret his Strategies.
